sentences.sContent: A similar example of lowered albedo occurs when sea-ice melts and disappears, causing the darker coloured sea underneath to absorb more heat.
sentences.sContent_eng: A similar example of lowered albedo occurs when sea-ice melts and disappears, causing the darker coloured sea underneath to absorb more heat.
sentences.sCn: 当海冰融化消失时，会同样降低反射率，导致深色的海底吸收更多的热量。

sentences.sContent: Different varieties of the same plant can vary in how much light they reflect, a property called albedo, so selecting for higher-albedo crops would enhance the cooling effect from agriculture.
sentences.sContent_eng: Different varieties of the same plant can vary in how much light they reflect, a property called albedo, so selecting for higher-albedo crops would enhance the cooling effect from agriculture.
sentences.sCn: 同一类植物的不同品种具有不同的反射率，而选择那些反射率更高的品种将能提高农业对控制全球变暖的贡献。

sentences.sContent: "You change the albedo of the Earth, " he explained.
sentences.sContent_eng: "You change the albedo of the Earth, " he explained.
sentences.sCn: 他解释道：“因为你改变了地球的反照率。

synos.tran: （行星等的）[核][天]反射率；星体反照率

trans.tranOther: the ratio of the intensity of light reflected from an object, such as a planet, to that of the light it receives from the sun
